product.title: AIKO PRO Professional 3 in 1 Hair Straightener Flat Iron, Hair Curler with Built-in Comb, Hair Straightener Brush with Adjustable Temperature, Instant Heat-Up, Dual Voltage, Ideal Gift

product.description_html:
UPGRADED 3-in-1 Hair Straightener, Curler & Hot Comb

Ideal Valentines Day Gifts for Her

The innovative hair technology Curling function / straightening function / combing function. After 9 months of research and testing, we finally launched this newly designed multi-functional model with suspended 3D ceramic plates Both time heating flat iron hair straightener, from safety to functional practicality, and multi-functional combination greatly help you save money.

1. Unique Twisted Plate Design Guides Curling

2. Upgraded and Improved Smooth Glide Design

3. 30s instant heating, fast ,even heat

4.The plate lock helps protect the flat iron plates during storage

5.Dual voltage compatible(100V-240V) for worldwide usage

Instant heating

12 temperature settings can be selected, built-in thermostat chip, to protect you hair

Lightweight & Easy to Use

Comb your hair like a professional salon to straighten it easily and effectively in less time

Safe and Secure

Special heat resistant material with buffer design near the heating plates avoid you from burning.

Perfect Gifts for Loved Ones and Friends

We packaged the AIKO PRO 3-in-1 Hair Straightener in a carefully crafted super cool colorful box with a cool illustration. We designed everything in such a way that people will fall in love with this gorgeous Hair Straightener as the first choice of gift!
product.description_full:
UPGRADED 3-in-1 Hair Straightener, Curler & Hot Comb Ideal Valentines Day Gifts for Her The innovative hair technology Curling function / straightening function / combing function. After 9 months of research and testing, we finally launched this newly designed multi-functional model with suspended 3D ceramic plates Both time heating flat iron hair straightener, from safety to functional practicality, and multi-functional combination greatly help you save money. 1. Unique Twisted Plate Design Guides Curling 2. Upgraded and Improved Smooth Glide Design 3. 30s instant heating, fast ,even heat 4.The plate lock helps protect the flat iron plates during storage 5.Dual voltage compatible(100V-240V) for worldwide usage Instant heating 12 temperature settings can be selected, built-in thermostat chip, to protect you hair Lightweight & Easy to Use Comb your hair like a professional salon to straighten it easily and effectively in less time Safe and Secure Special heat resistant material with buffer design near the heating plates avoid you from burning. Perfect Gifts for Loved Ones and Friends We packaged the AIKO PRO 3-in-1 Hair Straightener in a carefully crafted super cool colorful box with a cool illustration. We designed everything in such a way that people will fall in love with this gorgeous Hair Straightener as the first choice of gift! * 3 in 1 Multi-Function: The AIKO PRO ceramic tourmaline ionic flat iron hair straightener creates dramatic results on even the frizziest coarsest hair; quickly straighten, flip, and curl to create the effects you want.
 * Smart Anti-Perm: The latest Straightener Brush has 12 temperature control levels to choose from for fast and stable heating without damaging the hair Provides constant and stable heat Safe and fast styling without damaging the hair.
 * Advanced PTC technology: the best flat irons and straighteners with ceramic technology and tourmaline PTC fast heating Automatic thermostat for more effective protection of your hair.
 * Smart Temperature Control: Ceramic PTC heating, 30 seconds rapid heating, automatic constant temperature and it will automatic shut off after 60 minutes of non-use.Adjustable heat settings 250℉ - 470℉ gives greater control.The temperature of the inner comb can reach 355℉ and the temperature of the outer anti scalding comb is only about 113℉, the hot comb hair straightener is safe and effective.
 * Travel-Friendly: Worldwide dual voltage compatible 100v-240v works so you can take it with your vacation. Move freely with the 360 degree swivel cord.

UPGRADED 3-in-1 Hair Straightener, Curler & Hot Comb Ideal Valentines Day Gifts for Her The innovative hair technology Curling function / straightening function / combing function. Perfect Gifts for Loved Ones and Friends We packaged the AIKO PRO 3-in-1 Hair Straightener in a carefully crafted super cool colorful box with a cool illustration. We designed everything in such a way that people will fall in love with this gorgeous Hair Straightener as the first choice of gift!
  • 3 in 1 Multi-Function: The AIKO PRO ceramic tourmaline ionic flat iron hair straightener creates dramatic results on even the frizziest coarsest hair; quickly straighten, flip, and curl to create the effects you want.
  • Smart Anti-Perm: The latest Straightener Brush has 12 temperature control levels to choose from for fast and stable heating without damaging the hair Provides constant and stable heat Safe and fast styling without damaging the hair.
  • Advanced PTC technology: the best flat irons and straighteners with ceramic technology and tourmaline PTC fast heating Automatic thermostat for more effective protection of your hair.
  • Smart Temperature Control: Ceramic PTC heating, 30 seconds rapid heating, automatic constant temperature and it will automatic shut off after 60 minutes of non-use.Adjustable heat settings 250℉ - 470℉ gives greater control.The temperature of the inner comb can reach 355℉ and the temperature of the outer anti scalding comb is only about 113℉, the hot comb hair straightener is safe and effective.
  • Travel-Friendly: Worldwide dual voltage compatible 100v-240v works so you can take it with your vacation. Move freely with the 360 degree swivel cord.

protection_plans.title: Walmart Protection Plan - 3-Year Plan
protection_plans.description: Protect it today, enjoy it for years. Get award-winning Allstate service and support that goes above and beyond the manufacturer’s warranty. Health & beauty plans cover: Mechanical & electrical failures Breakdowns or failures during normal use Fast repairs & replacements with easy online claims available 24/7Includes 100% parts & labor with no hidden fees When you add your new health & beauty item to cart, be sure to add a Walmart Protection Plan, too. Simply add your plan at checkout. There’s no need to register your plan for it to be active. We’ll email you protection plan details after you check out.
